quoteText.quoteText: “My agent brought in an exceptionally capable contractor & other trades under her direction who quickly transformed the condo from ragged to beautiful!”
“I did not have the time or money to coordinate the repairs I knew I needed to get it sold. This program allowed me to get the most money for my house…”
“The changes made to the interior of the house through this program, though relatively minor, made all the difference in selling my home…”

faqItem.question: How can the RealVitalize® program help you?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"For many homeowners, the prospect of receiving high-quality renovations without paying upfront or incurring interest may seem unimaginable—but that’s how the RealVitalize® program truly works. Here are some other frequently-asked questions we hear from sellers, along with thorough answers. \n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqItem.question: Are there restrictions on the RealVitalize® program?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"There is a maximum cost allowed for a renovation, which is determined by each participating broker, typically between $20,000 and $50,000. \n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqItem.question: Is the RealVitalize® program available everywhere?

answer.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"At present, the RealVitalize® program is offered throughout the United States, through participating brokerage offices that operate under Realogy’s trusted real estate brands, including Coldwell Banker, Corcoran, Better Homes and Gardens Real Estate, ERA, and CENTURY 21. The RealVitalize program is currently available in every state except Delaware, Louisiana, North Dakota, Rhode Island, and South Dakota, though Realogy and Angi continue to explore opportunities to expand. \n\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
